education_text.0: Andrew Wilson Appel (born 1960) is the Eugene Higgins Professor of      Computer science computer science at      Princeton University Princeton UniversityAndrew Wilson Appel (born 1960) is the Eugene Higgins Professor of      Computer science computer science at      Princeton University Princeton UniversityFrom July 2005 to July 2006, he was a visiting researcher at the      redirect    Institut national de recherche en informatique et en automatique Institut national de recherche en informatique et en automatique (INRIA),      Rocquencourt, Yvelines Rocquencourt,      France, on sabbatical from Princeton UniversityFrom July 2005 to July 2006, he was a visiting researcher at the      redirect    Institut national de recherche en informatique et en automatique Institut national de recherche en informatique et en automatique (INRIA),      Rocquencourt, Yvelines Rocquencourt,      France, on sabbatical from Princeton University
